body.name: Suavitel Complete Fabric Conditioner, Soothing Lavender, 100 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 30 mins
features: One 100 oz bottle Suavitel Complete Soothing Lavender Fabric Conditioner
All day odor protection (1) for fresh and pleasant-smelling clothes
Suavitel Complete with Stain-Shield technology ensures color protection, making your clothes look newer for longer (2)
Suavitel Complete provides softness to fabric fibers, aligning them and preventing extensive wrinkle formation (2)
Indulge in the irresistible softness and freshness of the Suavitel Complete collection
Helps prevent stains from sticking (2) to avoid hassles during laundry routines
Upgrade your laundry routine with Suavitel Complete Soothing Lavender
Enjoy the ultimate care and freshness for your clothes
Suavitel is compatible with all types of washing machines, including HE Washing Machines***
body.description: Suavitel Complete is the ideal solution to caring for your clothes and your family's laundry with ease. Suavitel Complete now offers a new formula providing you with the softening and freshness that you and your family love. Our technology fights odors and helps with all day odor protection (1). Enjoy the confidence of fresh and pleasant-smelling clothes, and fewer wrinkles (2). Indulge in the irresistible softness and freshness that Suavitel Complete provides. Suavitel Complete helps prevent stains from sticking (2), tackling even the toughest stains with its Stain-Shield Technology; thereby helping your clothes look their best. Suavitel is compatible with all types of washing machines, including HE Washing Machines (3). Enjoy the long-lasting freshness and all-day odor protection with a formula that helps your clothes look newer, longer (2). Suavitel Complete Soothing Lavender is here to provide the ultimate care and freshness you deserve. (1) Tested on cotton and cotton polyester fabric; vs. detergent alone; against body odor (2) After 5 washes; tested on cotton and cotton-polyester fabric; vs. detergent alone (3) Follow the washer manufacturer's use and care guide for proper dispensing of the fabric conditioner

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #4,832 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #12 in Liquid Fabric Softener

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brand Story For decades, people have been obsessed with Suavitel. For the way it makes their laundry smell and feel—but also for how it makes them feel. Suavitel is more than just the sum of its parts. For those who grew up with it, they know: it’s unconditional love, bottled.

Suavitel Complete Liquid Fabric Softener with Stain Shield Technology Suavitel Shed Shield Liquid Fabric Softener for Pet Hair and Odor, Fresh Scent Suavitel Shed Shield is designed specifically for pet parents who want to win the fight against pet hair and odors. Suavitel Shed Shield helps you leave the fur behind by repelling pet hair compared with using detergent alone (1). Make Suavitel Shed Shield your go-to fabric conditioner to win the fight against pet fur mess. Suavitel Shed Shield not only repels pet hair (1) and fights pet odor (2), but it also leaves your fabrics soft and comfortable to touch. Suavitel Complete Liquid Fabric Softener with Stain Shield Technology, Soothing Lavender Bring them sunny days, every day. No matter what the season, one liquid fabric softener delivers a daily dose of warm summer sunshine. Suavitel Morning Sun Liquid Fabric Softener brings the optimism and positivity of a sunny day into your home, with a fresh scent that lasts and lasts. Tangerine essential oils add a citrusy brightness, with amber and musk notes that feel like a cool summer breeze. Suavitel Complete Liquid Fabric Softener with Stain Shield Technology, Morning Sun Suavitel Liquid Fabric Softener delivers a warm, loving touch that lasts. Irresistible softness and fragrances combine to create 45 days of freshness that truly smells like home. Compatible and safe to use with regular and HE washing machines, Suavitel Liquid Fabric Softener brings a loving, long-lasting freshness to your laundry and your life. For even better laundry results, pair Suavitel Liquid Fabric Softener with Suavitel Dryer Sheets for extra freshness! 50 Years of Loving Softness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hard to find! My favorite softner & homemade Frebreez
reviews.reviewText: My Favorite & it is not expensive... Just works for softness & smells great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This leaves our clothes smelling great and feeling soft. Our family is active and we use this to help our clothes from stinking. All you need is a small amount (in addition to your laundry detergent) and you’re good to go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am pretty impressed at how much more dog hair comes off because of using this.
reviews.reviewText: I am a dog lover and even though I love them, the hair gets everywhere and it can be a chore to keep my clothes from looking as "pet friendly" as I am. I decided to give this a try since I hadn't tried it and I was thrilled at the results. A nice light scent that stays with your clothes but it isn't overpowering and most importantly, RESULTS! More hair came off the lint guard than with any other softener I have used. I do wish that this came in a larger bottle is my only suggestion. Very happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fragrant and price
reviews.reviewText: Love this fabric softener, the fragrance is nice, clothes are softer and price is good too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love this product so much! As much as I have tried other scents and brands, this will always be my favorite esp for the babies clothes, it has that very smooth relaxing scent.I give it 4stars only because of the packaging. I subscribed for this for every two weeks delivery for “convenient purposes”. I cancelled few deliveries for the past two months since I have only been receiving damaged, leaked(half open and half empty bottles) messy package. Just yesterday, the mail lady had to help me carry the package to my garage cos of the damages. And this isn't the first time. I have called and e-mailed numerous times but there isn't any improvement of the packaging at all. Suggestions were sent to maybe put something in between the bottles to prevent it from shifting during shipment or tape the caps. But, nothing. Everything turned into a complete inconvenient on my end. After I received my last package, I have fully decided to cancel my subscription for these items to save my time and energy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It smells great
reviews.reviewText: I just used this in my wash. It smells really good. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it! I can see tangible results and my cloths look better!It has become part of my everyday laundry routine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this with Christmas presents for my kids. The detergent leaked all over the presents and it came missing the sticker on the packaging making it look unnamed with no details of what it is. Detergent all over everything and the box.
